merpi_desc: %USER's claws. Sharp and menacing or little scritchers, you could easily reach out and just...

merpi_normal: %USER rakes their claws hard against %TARGET's %T_PART, that'll leave a mark!!
merpi_flowery: %USER rakes their claws hard against %TARGET's %T_PART, that'll leave a mark!!

merpi_normal: %USER runs both of their sets of claws gently across %TARGET's %T_PART.
merpi_flowery: %USER runs both of their sets of claws gently across %TARGET's %T_PART.

merpi_normal: %USER teases both sets of claws across %TARGET's %T_PART.
merpi_flowery: %USER teases both sets of claws across %TARGET's %T_PART.

merpi_normal: %USER grasps %TARGET's %T_PART with both sets of their claws.
merpi_flowery: %USER grasps %TARGET's %T_PART with both sets of their claws.

merpi_normal: %USER squeezes %TARGET's %T_PART with their claw, not quite drawing blood!
merpi_flowery: %USER squeezes %TARGET's %T_PART with their claw, not quite drawing blood!

merpi_normal: %USER clasps %TARGET's %T_PART with their claws, not quick moves!
merpi_flowery: %USER clasps %TARGET's %T_PART with their claws, not quick moves!
